entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 9:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: E 19 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning early this evening. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
